pages.text: Increase the range of machines that have a working area, not all machines accept range addons. Each tier increases the range by 1.
pages.title: Range

pages.text: Increase how much the progress bar advances every tick. $(br2)Tier 1 -> +1$(br)Tier 2 -> +2
pages.title: Speed

pages.text: Decreases the amount of ticks need to complete an operation. $(br2)Tier 1 -> -10%$(br)Tier 2 -> -20%
pages.title: Efficiency
